message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $12000 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it provides.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and respect your valuation of the product. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $10500 for the product.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my target price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose a price of $9500 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your needs, I am pleased to offer a price of $10000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to compromise further. I propose a price of $9200 for the product.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Bob. I am willing to consider your latest proposal. I propose a price of $9500 for the product.
I'm getting close, Alice! I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I propose a price of $9250 for the product.
Thank you for your patience and willingness to negotiate, Bob. I am pleased to offer a price of $9400 for the product.
I'm getting close to my target price, Alice. I'm willing to make one final offer. I propose a price of $8800 for the product.
